plain: Based on the user's favourite movies, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is science fiction/fantasy, their favourite plot is action/adventure, their favourite musical score is epic/orchestral, their favourite mood for the musical score is intense/epic, their favourite setting is outer space or historical, their favourite visual style is cinematic, their favourite writing style is character-driven, their favourite runtime is around 2 hours, and their favourite themes are family, loyalty, and adventure.
